DOC.brief_title: Effect Capnography Feedback During Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation ( CPR ) Patient 's Outcome
DOC.detailed_description: This study do Mashhad Ghaem Educational center . Two nurse anesthesia resident select train accord late guideline CPR . In control sample , declare code 99 attend team patient 's bedside , CPR begin every two minute , return patient check usual way . quality performance rescuer , Recovery death patient result record . In second phase , group member educate use capnography ( Comdek 's MD-660P Oxi-Capnography ) CPR guide restoration effort . code 99 attend team patient 's bedside capnography use waveform appear monitor device visible rescuer quality performance renew base guidance . The two group patient age , sex , initial rhythm arrest , time arrest first action , time arrest first shock compare control factor influence outcome . quality performance rescuer , resuscitation outcome CPR duration relative factor group record compare .
